titleStmt.title: An account of Mr. Ferguson, his common-place-book in two letters.
titleStmt.author: Glanvill, Joseph, 1636-1680.
Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Clark for Walter Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Joseph Glanvill. Cf. BM.

Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library and Bodleian Library.
Mr. Glanvill his letter to Mr. Sherlock -- Mr. Sherlock his answer to Mr. Glanvill his letter.
